title: Local State Probabilities of Solvable Lattice Models: Relatives of $A_{n}^{(1)}$ Family
abstract: We present the results for the local state probabilities (LSP) of the solvable lattice models, constructed around rational conformal field theory given by WZW model on $SO(3)_{4 R}=SU(2)_{4 R} / Z_{2}$ together with primary field $\phi_{1}$(symmetric tensor of degree 2). Some conjectures for the LSP for some higher rank relatives of $A_{n}^{(1)}$ face models are also presented.
